definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 当水汽凝成雨水，会造成局域性的大气压力下降。

sentences.english: Atmospheric pressure acting on the downstream side of the diaphragm forces the diaphragm and seat up.
sentences.chinese: 作用于隔膜下侧的大气压力使隔膜和阀座上升开启。

sentences.english: The gas to be studied is admitted to the tube at a known temperature and at atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 被研究的气体在已知温度和大气压力下充入管中。

sentences.english: PRESSURE】The air pressure at sea level is nearly 15 pounds for each square inch.
sentences.chinese: 海平面上的大气压力每一平方英寸约有十五磅。

sentences.english: The deviation of sound above and below the atmospheric pressure levels is called Sound Pressure.
sentences.chinese: 上述偏差的声音和大气压力下被称为声压水平。

sentences.english: A high vacuum in the fuel tank can cause atmospheric pressure to collapse the tank.
sentences.chinese: 燃油箱内的高真空，会引起大气压力压塌油箱。

sentences.english: When a pressure is less than atmospheric pressure it is called a vacuum.
sentences.chinese: 某种压力低于大气压力的状况被称作真空。

sentences.english: If we did not have atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 假如我们没有大气压力。

sentences.english: These movements create a difference in atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 这些运动创建一个大气压力的差异。

sentences.english: By default, the Kestrel will record the barometric pressure and other settings hourly.
sentences.chinese: 产品默认每小时自动记录大气压力和其他设置。

sentences.english: When pressure is increased, the ancroid is squeezed, so it shortens.
sentences.chinese: 当大气压力增加时，膜盒压紧而缩短。

sentences.english: On Earth, the atmosphere is constantly pushing against your body.
sentences.chinese: 而在地球上，大气压力无处不在。

sentences.english: A barometer is used for measuring atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 气压计被用来测量大气压力。

sentences.english: Eventually, the balloon will grow from lack of atmospheric pressure, burst, and begin to fall.
sentences.chinese: 最终，气球会因为大气压力爆炸，开始降落。

sentences.english: A simple instrument for indicating changes in atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 显示大气压力变化的简单装置。

definition: millibar (mbar or mb), unit of pressure (equal to hectopascal)
Reynolds number (ratio of inertial forces to viscous forces in fluid mechanics)
